tool.name: Pdb
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the PDB REST API.

param.name: outname_output_pdb_path
param.label: output PDB name
param.help: Path to the output PDB file Format: [output].pdb

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: filter
param.label: filter
param.help: Array of groups to be kept. If value is None or False no filter will be applied. All the possible values are defined in the official PDB specification (http://www.wwpdb.org/documentation/file-format-content/format33/v3.3.html)

param.name: url
param.label: url
param.help: URL of the PDB REST API. Another option for this parameter is the MMB PDB mirror API ("http://mmb.irbbarcelona.org/api/pdb/").
